attribute.name: for
attribute.description: The client identifier of the component for which this component represents associated message(s).

attribute.name: showSummary
attribute.description: Indicates whether the summary of the message(s) should be displayed. Default is: true

attribute.name: showDetail
attribute.description: Indicates whether the detail of the message(s) should be displayed. Default is: false

attribute.name: globalOnly
attribute.description: Indicates whether only global messages (that is, messages with no associated client identifier) should be rendered. Default is: false
